titles.title: Our Day Of Joy Is Here Again

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Glory to our God, we sing, newline Glory to our Lord and King; newline Peace, goodwill with all abide, newline This holy Christmas tide.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Our day of joy is here again, newline With love and peace and song; newline Come, let us join the angelic strain newline With voices clear and strong.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: When darkness lay upon the earth, newline A glorious light did shine; newline God sent a Gift of priceless worth newline And showed His love divine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now to the manger let us go newline To worship and adore; newline The tender Babe upon the straw, newline Our Savior evermore.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: How wonderful that God's own Son newline Should so Himself abase! newline He thrust the mighty from their throne, newline And gave the lowly grace.
